description: Manages a Subscription within a API Management Service.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AllowTracing.description: Determines whether tracing can be enabled.  Defaults to `true`.

ApiId.description: The ID of the API which should be assigned to this Subscription. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ApiManagementName.description: The name of the API Management Service where this Subscription should be created. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

DisplayName.description: The display name of this Subscription.

PrimaryKey.description: The primary subscription key to use for the subscription.

ProductId.description: The ID of the Product which should be assigned to this Subscription. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the API Management Service exists. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

SecondaryKey.description: The secondary subscription key to use for the subscription.

State.description: The state of this Subscription. Possible values are `active`, `cancelled`, `expired`, `rejected`, `submitted` and `suspended`. Defaults to `submitted`.

SubscriptionId.description: An Identifier which should used as the ID of this Subscription. If not specified a new Subscription ID will be generated. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

UserId.description: The ID of the User which should be assigned to this Subscription. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
